articles.title: This week we reported that the AI boom "could come to a fairly swift end" - Dezeen
articles.description: This week on Dezeen, we reported that one of AI's leading voices, Gary Marcus, believes that the potential impacts of generative AI may be overblown.
articles.content:

articles.title: Fed chair warns US inflation battle not over and hints at further rate rises - The Guardian

articles.content:

articles.content: Unprecedented regulation forcing more than 40 online giants including Facebook, X, Google and TikTok to better police the content they deliver within the EU is due to come into force on 25 August. So… [+5218 chars]
